text: Galapa is a genus of Ecuadorian cellar spiders that was first described by B. A. Huber in 2000. it contains only three species, found only on the Galápagos Islands: G. baerti, G. bella, and G. floreana. ==See also== * List of Pholcidae species ==References== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Pholcidae
title: Galapa (spider)
